text: The Proclaimers are a Scottish folk rock band. The members are twin brothers, Charlie and Craig Reid (born 5 March 1962). They are best known for the songs "I'm Gonna Be (500 Miles)", "Sunshine on Leith", "I'm on My Way" and "Letter from America". They are also known for singing with a Scottish accent. The Reid brothers were born in Leith. They are fans of Hibernian and support Scottish independence. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Musical groups established in 1983 Category:Musicians from Edinburgh Category:Scottish musical groups Category:Scottish singers Category:Sibling musical duos Category:Twin people from the United Kingdom
title: The Proclaimers
